dc:title: Managed News
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Criticizes both the Catholic and secular press for misrepresenting Cuba's revolution. Describes the tensions and accusations that arose from her visit to Cuba and defends its religious freedom.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 118 1963-08-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
